description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. It is Christmas Eve and you just want to go to bed and wake up on Christmas morning.  But the tree is broken, the house it too cold, Mr. Peabody's tacky Xmas display is annoying and as always your brother won't go to bed.  Explore, interact with your environment and solve puzzles in this old-school adventure game.
description.short: It is Christmas Eve and you just want to go to bed and wake up on Christmas morning.  But the tree is broken, the house it too cold, Mr. Peabody's tacky Xmas display is annoying and as always your brother won't go to bed.  Explore, interact with your environment and solve puzzles in this old-school adventure game.
